name: SHIFT (itch) (QK9Gaming)
description:
SHIFT is a single-player puzzle/parkour game where the player can shift between five different types of robots to complete each level. Each bot has its own unique ability and using these abilities together is key to solving each level.

Made as part of a CAS Creativity Experience by an IBDP Y1 student.

It'd be greatly appreciated if you could provide some feedback.

Found an issue or a bug? Report it here.
